title: That Zombie Drank My Martini, or, A Happy Divorce!
description: Samantha Darling is feeling really good about her recent divorce. It’s 1935, or thereabouts, and she’s contemplating a new career as an aviatrix, freelance investigator, and practical feminist. But when she and her ex-husband cohost a party to compete for possession of their friends, secrets begin to emerge. In fact, they shamble right through the door.
author: Stephen Jankiewicz
